headers.value: default-src 'none' ; script-src 'self' https://ajax.cloudflare.com https://*.linkedin.com  https://*.licdn.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' https://static-exp1.licdn.com; img-src 'self' https://media.licdn.com https://static-exp1.licdn.com; font-src 'self' data:; media-src 'self' ; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; report-uri https://jwhite.report-uri.com/r/d/csp/enforce;

vibrate 'none'; ambient-light-sensor 'none'; autoplay 'none'; accelerometer 'none'; camera 'none'; document-domain 'none'; encrypted-media 'none'; fullscreen 'none'; geolocation 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; microphone 'none'; midi 'none'; payment 'none'; picture-in-picture 'none'; speaker 'none'; sync-xhr 'none'; vr 'none'
